name: biomni-query-worms
title: Biomni: Query Worms
description: Query the World Register of Marine Species for authoritative taxonomic information on marine organisms.
content:
Overview

Searches WoRMS, the authoritative marine taxonomy catalogue containing over 240,000 accepted species names with synonymy, taxonomy, distribution, and biological traits.

Input Parameters

  • prompt (string, optional): Natural language query
  • endpoint (string, optional): WoRMS endpoint
  • verbose (boolean, optional): Enable logging

Biological Use Case

Essential for marine biology, taxonomy, and biodiversity studies. Researchers use WoRMS to verify species names, access classifications, identify synonyms, understand distributions, link to traits, and standardize nomenclature.

Output

Returns JSON (worms_results.json) with taxonomic info including AphiaIDs, scientific names, authorship, classification, synonyms, accepted names, status, distribution, and database cross-references.

Category

database
